column2: Park Hotels & Resorts, Inc. operates as a real estate investment trust, which owns and operates hotels and resorts. The company is headquartered in Tysons Corner, Virginia and currently employs 517 full-time employees. The firm has a portfolio of hotels and resorts. The firm operates through ownership segment, which includes all of its hotel properties. The firm's portfolio consists of approximately 63 hotels and resorts with over 34,000 rooms located in the United States and international markets. Its portfolio includes hotels in areas, such as New York City, Washington, D.C., Chicago, San Francisco and London; resorts in leisure destinations, including Hawaii, Orlando and Key West, and a range of properties adjacent to gateway airports, such as Los Angeles International, Chicago O'Hare, Boston Logan and Miami Airport, and select suburban locations. The firm's brand affiliations include DoubleTree by Hilton, Embassy Suites by Hilton, Hampton by Hilton, Hilton Hotels & Resorts, Hilaton Garden Inn, Curio - A Collection by Hilton, and Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts.
